name: Quran Recitation & Tajweed
description: Learn proper pronunciation and recitation rules of the Quran

name: Tafsir (Quranic Exegesis)
description: In-depth study of Quranic interpretation and meaning

name: Fiqh (Islamic Jurisprudence)
description: Understanding Islamic law and its application in daily life

name: Hadith Studies
description: Learning the sayings and traditions of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

name: Islamic History
description: Exploring the rich history of Islamic civilization

name: Aqeedah (Islamic Creed)
description: Understanding the fundamental beliefs in Islam

name: Seerah (Prophetic Biography)
description: Studying the life and character of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

name: Islamic Ethics & Spirituality
description: Developing character and spiritual connection in Islam
